Class PaperCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • PaperCollection

  • public class PaperCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    PaperCollection is the class used to create a Paper Collection object which manages the papers imported from a file.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int compareValue 
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<Paper> paperCollection

      Adds a paper without a Digital Object ID to the collection of papers.
      void addPaper(java.lang.String typeOfPaper, java.lang.String authors, java.lang.String titleOfPaper, java.lang.String titleOfSerial, java.lang.String numbers, java.lang.String publicationDate, java.lang.String digitalObjectIdentifier)
      Adds a paper with a Digital Object ID to the collection of papers.

      Sets the compare values of the collection of the papers so that the papers are sorted correctly based on a specified criteria.

      The sort method for the PaperCollection class that uses Collections.sort() to sort for each received case.

    • Method Detail

      • addPaper

        public void addPaper(java.lang.String typeOfPaper,
            java.lang.String authors,
            java.lang.String titleOfPaper,
            java.lang.String titleOfSerial,
            java.lang.String numbers,
            java.lang.String publicationDate,
            java.lang.String digitalObjectIdentifier)
        Adds a paper with a Digital Object ID to the collection of papers.
        Parameters:
        typeOfPaper - the type of the paper
        authors - the authors of the paper
        titleOfPaper - the title of the paper
        titleOfSerial - the title of the serial of the paper
        numbers - the number of volumes and issues for the paper (if the paper is a journal) and the page number
        publicationDate - the date the paper was published
        digitalObjectIdentifier - the digital object identifier of the paper

      • addPaper

        public void addPaper(java.lang.String typeOfPaper,
            java.lang.String authors,
            java.lang.String titleOfPaper,
            java.lang.String titleOfSerial,
            java.lang.String numbers,
            java.lang.String publicationDate)
        Adds a paper without a Digital Object ID to the collection of papers.
        Parameters:
        typeOfPaper - the type of the paper
        authors - the authors of the paper
        titleOfPaper - the title of the paper
        titleOfSerial - the title of the serial of the paper
        numbers - the number of volumes and issues for the paper (if the paper is a journal) and the page number
        publicationDate - the date the paper was published

      • sort

        public void sort(java.lang.String receivedCase,
        PaperCollection paperCollection)
        The sort method for the PaperCollection class that uses Collections.sort() to sort for each received case.
        Parameters:
        receivedCase - the case in which to sort specified by the user
        paperCollection - the collection of papers to sort

      • search

        public int search(java.lang.String key)
           throws java.text.ParseException
        The search method for the PaperCollection class that uses binary and linear search to search for a key specified by the user.
        Parameters:
        key - the key being searched for by the user
        Returns:
        the index of the found paper
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException
